message:
At today's PRAGATI session, reviewed issues relating to disbursement of scholarships/fellowships to students. 

Other issues discussed include modernization & expansion at Bhilai Steel Plant & ‘waste to wealth’ initiative under Swachh Bharat Mission. Progress under Revised National Tuberculosis Control Programme was also deliberated at the PRAGATI session today.  http://pmindia.gov.in/en/news_updates/pms-interaction-through-pragati-12/?comment=disable
